mapper.insert: insert into schedule_group (name, departmentId, ownerId, color, createdAt) values (#{name},#{departmentId},#{ownerId},#{color},now())
mapper.select: SELECT g.id FROM schedule_group g WHERE g.name = '회사일정' LIMIT 1
mapper.update: update schedule_group set name=#{name},color=#{color} where id=#{id}
